metadata.title: CVE-2024-44988 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: dsa: mv88e6xxx: Fix out-of-bound accessIf an ATU violation was caused by a CPU Load operation, the SPID couldbe larger than DSA_MAX_PORTS (the size of mv88e6xxx_chip.ports[] array).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44988` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1001.1').
